definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: I need to get back in shape.
sentences.chinese: 我要減回到原來的身材。

sentences.english: The Ruler body shape is usually equally thin from bottom to top.
sentences.chinese: 直尺型身材通常上下身均瘦。

sentences.english: Her Achilles' heel is her tallness.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一的缺陷就是身材太高。

sentences.english: The Squire presided, dignified and tall.
sentences.chinese: 尊嚴的治安官當主席，身材筆挺。

sentences.english: Her Achills' heel is her tallness.
sentences.chinese: 她的唯一缺陷是身材太高。

sentences.english: Your costume can't even do justice to your slender figure.
sentences.chinese: 穿成這樣也太對不住你的好身材了。

sentences.english: A big man can have bodily strength, but spiritual weakness.
sentences.chinese: 一個身材高大的人可能身體健壯，但可能精神脆弱。

sentences.english: Long-stemmed models ankled though the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 身材修長的模特兒嫋嫋婷婷地走過大廳。

sentences.english: The guys and gals holding poses often have dramatic looks and body types.
sentences.chinese: 男女模特常常有驚豔的外表和身材。

sentences.english: how much better people feel when they're in shape and just being healthy.
sentences.chinese: 他們身材好了，健康了以後，感覺也會好很多。

sentences.english: She is on a diet in order to keep a willowy figure.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保持苗條的身材，她正在節食。

sentences.english: I have smooth skin and slim shape.
sentences.chinese: 我有白嫩的皮膚和優美的身材。

sentences.english: Many times brides were very young girls and, therefore, small in stature.
sentences.chinese: 許多新娘都是非常年輕的小姑娘，所以，身材也嬌小。

sentences.english: The secretary's beautiful figure and suave manners made the of-fice bright.
sentences.chinese: 祕書美麗的身材及文雅的態度，使得辦公室爲一亮。

sentences.english: The H frame body shape has a larger waist and shoulders.
sentences.chinese: H型身材腰與肩膀的部位稍爲寬大。

sentences.english: A young woman was coming toward me, her figure long and slim.
sentences.chinese: 一個身材苗條的姑娘向我走來。

definition: (of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
